extension.summary: Watch free TV shows and movies from tubitv.com
extension.description: Tubi TV offers free popular movies and TV series streaming to you in full HD. Unlike Netflix and Hulu, Tubi TV is absolutely free. You don’t have to spend a dime. You don’t have to register with your credit card. Unlike cable, you can watch it anywhere, anytime and on any device, so grab your popcorn and enjoy! Free shows and movies are added every week, so you’ll never run out of entertainment on the go. Watch new movies, action flicks, documentaries, Korean dramas, anime, horror and so much more, without ever paying a subscription fee! Tubi TV has the largest library of free and legal TV shows and movies to choose from, whenever and wherever you want!

extension.description: Please visit [COLOR blue]https://www.tvaddons.co[/COLOR] for addon support! Buzzr is a pop culture time capsule – an unending celebration where viewers can play along to some of Fremantle's vast portfolio of more than 40,000 iconic game show episodes, which are shown around the clock. Featured titles include Family Feud, where you won’t want to miss the outrageously fun Richard Dawson kissing every female contestant; What’s My Line, featuring cultural icons becoming time-stamped contestants/panelists like a 29-year-old whip-smart Betty White and a young Muhammad Ali; as well as famed titles To Tell the Truth, Match Game, Password, Beat the Clock, Blockbusters and Card Sharks.

extension.description: Please visit [COLOR blue]https://www.tvaddons.co[/COLOR] for addon support! Comet TV is a new television channel dedicated to sci-fi entertainment offering popular favorites, cult classics, and undiscovered gems, every day.

Provide a mapping between Super Favourites plugin + IPTV channels + XMLTV of your choice, 1) Mandatory: Choose your XMLTV location 2) Mandatory: Choose your Super Favourites folder that will contain auto created sub folder where you will put your iptv links 3) Option: Tune options like timezone, etc... ( optional settings tab ) 4) Style: Customize your SFX look and feel ( look and feel tab ). 5) Add your iptv links to the correct folder ( with super favourites regular addon ) 6) Start the plugin
All contributions are welcome: coding / tests debug / translations / donations, our mail and paypal address : 007.nux@gmail.com

Fournit un mapping entre le plugin Super Favourites + vos liens IPTV + votre fichier XMLTV, 1) Obligatoire: Définissez l'endroit ou se trouve votre fichier XMLTV. 2) Obligatoire: Choisissez le répertoire Super Favourites qui contiendra les sous répertoires créés automatiquement, ou vous irez placer vos liens iptv. 3) Optionnel: Affinez vos paramètres de time shift, etc ... ( onglet optionnel ) 4) Style: Customisez le style de la grille epg ( Style ) 5) Peuplez les sous dossiers avec vos liens IPTV ( avec le plugin super favourites régulier ) 6) Vous y êtes ! Toute contribution est la bienvenue: code/ tests debug / traductions / dons, notre adresse mail et paypal : 007.nux@gmail.com
extension.news: Beta relese 1.1.2 beta 3 Contributions: ----------------- Thank's to Adulescente for hard testing

extension.description: Playlist Loader
Playlist Loader
extension.news:
1.2.1 - Taking ownership of the addon, see : https://github.com/avigdork/xbmc-avigdork/pull/8#issuecomment-416955692 - Fixed regex => grouping issue when tvg-logo was empty. - Added icon image also when items are grouped. - Regex fix for title containing comas. - Added TheTvDb scan for each lists in contextual menu ( beta ).
1.2.0 - (fix) support strings.xml (old Kodi versions).
1.1.9 - Added an option to show groups in channels lists.

extension.description: 2018 Winter Olympic streams from the CBC. Streams are geo-blocked so you must be on a Canadian IP for this to work.
extension.news: v1.0.1 - Added bitrate limit setting - Changed Python dependency to 2.24 for Kodi 16 compatibility - Added durations to video listing - Added start times to upcoming events
